title: Biography on Brode Vosloo ?
content:
Hi,   
I've been searching for some information on Brode Vosloo for a while now but i can't really seem to find more than a few sentences about him.   
So i wondered if someone here could help me out with a biography, links or anything (even book references) of informative value.   
Thanks

comments.content:
The SacredNipple, Inc. is a South African based digital type foundry. Founded in 1998, by Brode Vosloo and Lyall Coburn, it is the only South African type foundry to make a concious effort to promote the splendours of african design and typography.   
   
The SacredNipple, Inc. holds exclusive license to over 40 original typefaces designs created by a selection of some of South Africa's brightest type designers.   
   
I think I have his email address somewhere if that would be helpful?   
   
Jim
